H0.text: Which hotel is world-famous for its 'grill'. The Plaza Hotel

H1.text: Which hotel is world-famous for its 'grill'. The Ritz Hotel

H2.text: Which hotel is world-famous for its 'grill'. The Bellagio

H3.text: Which hotel is world-famous for its 'grill'. Savoys

A4.text: The hotel has three restaurants, all managed by Gordon Ramsay: the Savoy Grill, on the north side of the building, with its entrance off the Strand

A5.text: The Savoy Grill lost its Michelin star and reopened to mixed reviews
